- NHS budget up in real terms 
- Deficit down 9/10ths and debt falling as share of econ 
- Youth unemployment halved

html: A reminder that BST becomes GMT on Sunday as the clocks go back 1 hour at 2am. Sunrise on Sunday will be at 6.51am & the sun will set at 4.42pm. It’s then 53 days until the shortest day of the year on Friday 21st December when sunrise is at 8.10am & sunset will be at 3.52pm.pic.twitter.com/A7HDOLDVJ1
text:
A reminder that BST becomes GMT on Sunday as the clocks go back 1 hour at 2am.

Sunrise on Sunday will be at 6.51am & the sun will set at 4.42pm.

It’s then 53 days until the shortest day of the year on Friday 21st December when sunrise is at 8.10am & sunset will be at 3.52pm.pic.twitter.com/A7HDOLDVJ1

A Weasel walks into a bar. 
"How old are you?" asked the barman.
"15" The Weasel replied.
"I'm afraid I can't serve you alcohol." Said the Barman "So what would you like?"
"Pop" goes the Weasel.
